channel.title: With the "Deathnote" drawing announcement/GIF preview, we're opening a new subforum called "Deathnotes"
channel.description: The "Deathnotes" forum will be used once the forum is live to screenshot and post the best of the best deathnotes you've ever seen. Deathnotes can be drawn in both ink (black) and blood (red) with your mouse. We bet you'll find tons of creative stuff out there, so post the best of the best in the new subforum when it comes out. Probably goes without saying, but **no NSFW stuff**~ It would be great in the future if we can program an auto-uploaded gallery to display of the drawn deathnotes - maybe in the future with imgur? Anyway, the forum! Not useful now, but later it will be.

item.title: With the "Deathnote" drawing announcement/GIF preview, we're opening a new subforum called "Deathnotes"
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
The “Deathnotes” forum will be used once the forum is live to screenshot and post the best of the best deathnotes you’ve ever seen.

uptnw963s6ox.gif480×700 2.35 MB

Deathnotes can be drawn in both ink (black) and blood (red) with your mouse. We bet you’ll find tons of creative stuff out there, so post the best of the best in the new subforum when it comes out.

Probably goes without saying, but no NSFW stuff~

It would be great in the future if we can program an auto-uploaded gallery to display of the drawn deathnotes - maybe in the future with imgur?

Anyway, the forum! Not useful now, but later it will be.

Read full topic
item.source: With the "Deathnote" drawing announcement/GIF preview, we're opening a new subforum called "Deathnotes"
